title: Start
body: <> {{bobby,happy}} Hi welcome to the demo {{bobby}} I'll try to show you some of the features that you can use with this template {{bobby}} Can we start? [[Yes.|explanation]] [[No.|awkward_pause]]

title: awkward_pause
body:
{{bobby}} ...Okay.
//This is awkward. Why did you say no?
...
{{bobby}} ...
[[...]]
[[...So, about that secret ending?|secret]] <<random 5>>
{{bobby}} Can we...
[[Yeah fine, let's start.|explanation]]
[[I said no.|awkward_pause]]

title: explanation
body:
{{bobby}} Well there's not much to say honestly.
{{bobby}} The documentation in README.md should give you most of the information you need.
{{bobby}} Have you read it?
[[Yeah it's very well written.|you_lier]]
[[Not yet.|go_read_it]]
[[Yes and it sucks. I hated it.|i_know_right]]

title: i_know_right
you_lier
body:
<<string liedToBobby true>>
{{bobby}} You don't have to lie to me...
{{bobby,happy}} I know it sucks, that's why I'm here to provide at least a working example!
[[{{bobby}} Anyway...|thanks_bobby]]

title: go_read_it
body:
{{bobby,happy}} Then do it now! It's a bit long but there are important things to know.
{{bobby}} It should give you some advice on how to get started with your own game.
{{bobby}} I'll just wait here.
{{bobby}} ...
[[{{bobby,happy}} Oh, you must be done reading since you're back here!|thanks_bobby]]

title: thanks_bobby
body:
{{bobby}} You can open this story file in your dialogue editor now.
{{bobby,happy}} And then you should be ready to start working on your own game!
{{alice}} Who's working on a game?
{{bobby,happy}} Oh hi, Alice!
{{alice}} Who are you talking to, Bobby?
[[{{bobby}} I have no idea, but they're cool.]] <<string liedToBobby != true>>
[[{{bobby}} I have no idea, but they're cool. Well they lied to me once but it's okay.]] <<string liedToBobby == true>>
{{alice,happy}} Well good luck, stranger!
[[{{bobby,happy}} See you soon!|end]]
